Posts.EditableText:
I just found out today that there is a new version of Quest, great work!

I also found out that there is a spanish member developing Quest.  So, here is my question, why the new options hasn't been translated to spanish?  Do you need me to take care of that as the last time? I translated the previous version.

Thank you and welcome aboard Luis, nice to have a spanish fellow! I dont remember you from the CAAD.
